name: Cartoon Network: Block Party
description: Cartoon Network: Block Party is an arcade-style video game for Game Boy Advance developed by Majesco Entertainment and released in the United States on August 5, 2004 and in Europe and Oceania on September 15, 2004. It features characters from Cartoon Network original animated series such as Johnny Bravo, Ed Edd n Eddy, Courage the Cowardly Dog, and Cow and Chicken.
